name: KSU D2L Dark Theme
description: A dark theme for Kennesaw State University's D2L page. kennesaw.view.usg.edu
additional_info: Version 1.06 - Fixed light blue background for class list Version 1.05 - Fixed quiz popup background and table coloring Version 1.04 - Fixed red background on error message in the login screen Version 1.03 - Fixed white background on spans on the homepage - Fixed blue highlighting on new notification hover Version 1.02 - Fixed Notification coloring and other few minor bugs Version 1.01 - Fixed 'Dropbox' section colors Version 1.0 - Dark theme - Only compatible with Chrome - Not tested with 'Quizzes' or 'Other' sections

discussions.name: Trying to use this with PCC's D2L
Content browser displays white, fix attached
